effect.Name: Addition With Arcsinus
effect.description: Addition With Arcsinus - Shader adds base and blend colors with each other then colors are calculated by arcsinus
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Addition With Arcsinus (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader adds base and blend colors with each other then colors are calculated by arcsinus

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
